name: Papermania
description:
Papermania

      In PaperMania, play as Lewis, the school's troublemaker or hero?....  as you throw paper balls at your teacher to enrage them & cause them to quit their job. Overthrow the boredom plague that surrounds the students at Grey Academy.  But avoid getting caught by the teacher or the class pets. Will you get away with it or will you be punished and repeat the same grade all over again?

Features:
  • Physics based shoot mechanics 
  • Free-roam walking around the classroom 
  • Stealth based gameplay avoiding class pets and getting back into the seat before that teacher turns around 
  • Multiple projectiles (Paperballs, books, backpacks...) 
Story Background: 

        Lewis quickly finds out the school isn't for him but he knows that is it for others. Lewis is the only person in this school that can see through this boredom plague that affects the student lives and the school. His hope is to purge the faculty that creates such a toxic environment, however this comes at the price of being labeled a "troublemaker" or a bad kid but it might just be worth it.

Keyboard Controls:

WASD - Move/Change directions

AD (in seat) - Turn around 

F - Sit down/Get Up 

Space - Shoot 

Q & E - Switch between projectiles
